titleStmt.title: The speeche vvhich the French King made to the Lords of the Parliament on the fifth of Ianuary. 1599 Faithfully translated out of French, by H.W.
titleStmt.author: Henry IV, King of France, 1553-1610.
H. W.

publicationStmt.publisher: [by J. Windet for] Iohn VVolfe, and are to be solde at his shop in Popes head Alley, neere vnto the Exchange,

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of original in the Lambeth Palace Library.

place.placeName: his shop in Popes head Alley, neere vnto the Exchange
